description: Reaction as Spain beat Zambia to reach last 16 of the 2023 Women's World Cup.
title: Fifa Women's World Cup LIVE: Watch Spain vs Zambia score, commentary & updates from Group C game
title_page: Fifa Women's World Cup LIVE: Watch Spain vs Zambia score, commentary & updates from Group C game - BBC Sport
maintext:
Goodbye
That's the end of this live text, thanks for joining us today.
We'll be back in an hour and 15 minutes (in a different live page) for the Republic of Ireland's date with destiny against Canada.
Bye for now.
'This is a different Spain to the Euros'
FT: Spain 5-0 Zambia
Anita Asante
Former England defender on BBC Two
The Japan game will be an exciting test. What we need to remember is players like Hermoso weren't available in the Euros. Now they have them back.
Post
FT: Spain 5-0 Zambia
Katie Smith
BBC reporter at Eden Park
A couple of the Zambia players sink to the grass.
They really gave that everything but their World Cup exit is confirmed and the wait for a first goal goes on too.
Post
Spain 5-0 Zambia
Spain play Japan on Monday in the final group game. They just need a draw to finish top. If the Japanese win, they have top spot.
They will play the top two teams from Group A (in the opposite order) - so Switzerland, New Zealand, the Philippines or Norway.
'VAR has been used well'
Spain 5-0 Zambia
Karen Bardsley
Former England and Manchester City goalkeeper on BBC Two
So far, every time VAR has been involved, they have been correct.
It seems like we are heading in the right direction.
